thread.title: Alberta RCMP at scene of ongoing incident in Pincher Creek, urge people to stay away
thread.title_full: Alberta RCMP at scene of ongoing incident in Pincher Creek, urge people to stay away

author: Lisa MacGregor
title: Alberta RCMP at scene of ongoing incident in Pincher Creek, urge people to stay away
text:
February 25, 2017 10:25 pm Alberta RCMP at scene of ongoing incident in Pincher Creek, urge people to stay away By Lisa MacGregor Reporter Global News 
File/Alberta RCMP Global News What is this? 
Sponsored content is written by Global News' editorial staff without any editorial influence by the sponsor. If you'd like to learn more... X What is this? 
Sponsored content is written by Global News' without any editorial influence by the sponsor. If you'd like to learn more... - Listen 
RCMP and the Emergency Response Team were called to an area in the Town of Pincher Creek Saturday. 
Police have contained the area and are asking the public and media to avoid the area of Macleod Street. 
Police are also asking the public to refrain from taking pictures of police in the area or posting the location on social media. 

— RCMP Alberta (@RCMPAlberta) February 26, 2017 2/2 Stay away from police activity and do not share incident details/locations on social media. 
— RCMP Alberta (@RCMPAlberta) February 26, 2017 
Mounties have not released any further details on the incident. 
More to come….
